subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: While the Randy Johnson trade talks have absorbed most of the Yankees’ attention, they are still interested in signing a first baseman, with Travis Lee emerging as an option if they cannot sign Doug Mientkiewicz.
snippet: While the Randy Johnson trade talks have absorbed most of the Yankees’ attention, they are still interested in signing a first baseman, with Travis Lee emerging as an option if they cannot sign Doug Mientkiewicz.
